title: Larry Page - Sergey Brin, Education & Age
snippet: Born in Michigan in 1973, Larry Page's parents were both computer experts. Following in their footsteps, he studied computer engineering at Stanford University, where he met Sergey Brin.

title: Larry Page - Wikipedia
snippet: Lawrence Edward Page (born March 26, 1973) is an American businessman and computer scientist who co-founded Google with Sergey Brin. Page is a centibillionaire and among the richest people in the world. Page was chief executive officer of Google from 1997 until August 2001 when he was succeeded ...

title: Larry Page and Sergey Brin Biography - family, name, history, school, young, son, old, information, college, house
snippet: Larry Page and Sergey Brin founded Google, the Internet search engine, while they were graduate students at Stanford University in Palo Alto, California. Since its founding in 1998, Google has become one of the most successful dot-com businesses in history.

title: Sergey Brin and Larry Page | Lemelson
snippet: Born in Moscow, Russia, on August 21, 1973, Brin emigrated to the U.S. with his family in 1979 and grew up in Maryland, where his father worked as a mathematics professor. He earned a BA from the University of Maryland in 1993 and completed his MA at Stanford in 1995.

title: Larry Page and Sergey Brin Facts, Worksheets & Biography For Kids
snippet: He graduated from the University of Maryland at College Park with a degree in mathematics and computer science. Upon graduation, he entered Stanford University for his Ph.D. In 2007, Brin married Anne Wojcicki, a biotech analyst.
